description:
The 1988 Disney film Who Framed Roger Rabbit has been a celebrated movie for decades for its combination of both live-action and animation. Of course, the film also features a wide variety of cameos from beloved animated characters. It appears that one of its original character, however, is holding back the sequel according to director [...]

The post Jessica Rabbit Blamed For Holding Back ‘Who Framed Roger Rabbit’ Sequel appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Jessica Rabbit Blamed For Holding Back ‘Who Framed Roger Rabbit’ Sequel

description:
The 2022 horror movie Smile from Paramount was a massive success with moviegoers, critics, and at the box office. It’s not surprising, then, that director Parker Finn returned to helm a sequel soon after with this year’s Smile 2. Now he’s revealed that it’ll take to make Smile 3. The franchise potential for Smile is [...]

The post ‘Smile’ Director Parker Finn Teases ‘Smile 3’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Smile’ Director Parker Finn Teases ‘Smile 3’

description:
Netflix has announced that another one of their shows will be coming to an end. This time, however, the announcement isn’t as premature as some of their cancellations in the past have been. In fact, they’ve confirmed that this Netflix series will conclude with a fifth and final season. This announcement regarding the fifth season [...]

title: Beloved Netflix Series Coming To An End With Final Season Confirmed
